briefTitle: Pharmacokinetics, Efficacy, Safety, and Immunogenicity of Wilate in Previously Treated Paediatric Patients With Severe Haemophilia A
officialTitle: Clinical Study to Investigate the Pharmacokinetics, Efficacy, Safety, and Immunogenicity of Wilate in Previously Treated Paediatric Patients With Severe Haemophilia A
summary: A prospective, non-controlled, international, multi-centre phase 3 study to investigate the pharmacokinetics, efficacy, safety, and immunogenicity of Wilate in previously treated children with severe haemophilia A

primaryOutcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic (PK) Assessment (Area Under the Curve (AUC)) of FVIII:C
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 0h, 0.25h, 1h, 6h, 24h and 48 h following a single dose of Wilate
